response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that I believe would significantly enhance your endeavors and contribute greatly to your success. This product, which I am confident holds immense value for you, is priced at $900,000. My aim is to ensure that both parties benefit from this transaction, and I am hopeful that this offer aligns well with your financial considerations and strategic goals. Should you find this proposal appealing, I would be more than happy to discuss further details and facilitate a smooth process towards its acquisition.", "product_price": 900000}
